title: Holy Rosary Parish in Angeles City, Pampanga named 30th minor basilica in PH
desc: The Holy Rosary Parish Church in Angeles City, Pampanga has been named a minor basilica, according to the Catholic Bishops' Conference of the Philippines (CBCP) News.

title: African Development Fund Approves $24.45 Million Grant Bringing Safe Water and Sanitation to Somali Towns
desc: Announcement - The Board of Directors of the African Development Fund, the Bank Group's concessional window, has approved a $24.45 million grant to improve access to clean water and sanitation in Somalia.

title: USA takes bronze in the women's team combined as Mikaela Shiffrin misses podium : NPR
desc: The team combined event pairs a downhill skier with a slalom skier. The top U.S. duo — the slalom star Shiffrin and Breezy Johnson, who won gold in the downhill on Sunday — is a medal favorite.
